data.eml:eml: The genus Homaloxestis Meyrick (Lepidoptera: Lecithoceridae) from China, with descriptions of two new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Liu, Shurong, Wang, Shuxia (2014): The genus Homaloxestis Meyrick (Lepidoptera: Lecithoceridae) from China, with descriptions of two new species. Zootaxa 3760 (1): 79-88, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3760.1.5
